column1: What does HTML stand for?, "HyperText Markup Language", "Hyper Transfer Markup Language", "HighText Machine Language", "None of the above", "A"
Which tag is used to define a paragraph?, "[para]", "[txt]", "[paragraph]", "[p]", "D"
What is the correct HTML tag for inserting an image?, "[image]", "[img]", "[pic]", "[src]", "B"
Which tag is used to create a hyperlink?, "[link]", "[href]", "[a]", "[url]", "C"
Which HTML element represents a table row?, "[tr]", "[td]", "[table]", "[row]", "A"
What is the correct syntax for an unordered list?, "[li]", "[list]", "[ul]", "[ol]", "C"
Which HTML tag is used for defining a form?, "[form]", "[input]", "[fieldset]", "[table]", "A"
Which attribute specifies the text shown in an image when it cannot load?, "title", "href", "alt", "src", "C"
Which HTML tag is used to define metadata about the document?, "[meta]", "[head]", "[title]", "[style]", "A;B"
What is the default character encoding in HTML5?, "ASCII", "ISO-8859-1", "UTF-8", "Unicode", "C;D"
